#{idCardDetailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tenant_id = #{tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_dept = #{createDept,jdbcType=BIGINT}, job_position_other = #{jobPositionOther,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, company_business_nature_other = #{companyBusinessNatureOther,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_area = #{phoneArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cust_id = #{custId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: WITH total_count AS ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS total FROM customer_basic_info WHERE is_deleted = 0 ) SELECT CASE WHEN id_kind IN (1, 2) THEN id_kind ELSE 3 END AS id_kind, CASE WHEN id_kind = 1 THEN '香港' WHEN id_kind = 2 THEN '大陆' ELSE '其它' END AS idKindName, COUNT(*) AS count, ROUND(COUNT(*) * 100.0 / total_count.total, 2) AS ratio FROM customer_basic_info, total_count WHERE is_deleted = 0 GROUP BY CASE WHEN id_kind IN (1, 2) THEN id_kind ELSE 3 END, CASE WHEN id_kind = 1 THEN '香港' WHEN id_kind = 2 THEN '大陆' ELSE '其它' END ORDER BY id_kind ASC
